scripts.e2e:safe-smoke: sh -lc 'if curl -sS -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"method\":\"eth_chainId\",\"params\":[]}" http://127.0.0.1:8545 >/dev/null 2>&1; then NEED_ANVIL=0; else NEED_ANVIL=1; fi; if [ "$NEED_ANVIL" -eq 1 ]; then bun run --cwd ../.. dev:anvil >/tmp/safe-smoke-anvil.log 2>&1 & ANVIL_PID=$!; fi; cleanup(){ if [ -n "$ANVIL_PID" ]; then kill "$ANVIL_PID" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi; }; trap cleanup EXIT INT TERM; n=0; until curl -sS -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"method\":\"eth_chainId\",\"params\":[]}" http://127.0.0.1:8545 >/dev/null 2>&1; do n=$((n+1)); if [ "$n" -ge 60 ]; then echo "Timed out waiting for Anvil RPC at 127.0.0.1:8545"; exit 1; fi; sleep 1; done; playwright test e2e/safe-smoke.spec.ts --config=playwright.config.ts --project=chromium'
